solution_line_template: From city A to city B, the bus carried {first_trip_fraction}*{capacity} = <<{first_trip_fraction}*{capacity}={passengers_first_trip}>>{passengers_first_trip} passengers
On the return trip, the bus carried {return_trip_fraction}*{capacity} = <<{return_trip_fraction}*{capacity}={passengers_return_trip}>>{passengers_return_trip} passengers
In total, the bus carried {passengers_return_trip}+{passengers_first_trip} = <<{passengers_return_trip}+{passengers_first_trip}={total_passengers}>>{total_passengers} passengers.
